channel.title: Need help with a pretty simple thing
channel.description:
Okay, so I wan't to have a system like this:
If you have 10M, you can buy a item from the store (I plan it to be Tokkul) which is worth 10M each, and when you sell it to the store you get your 10M back.
So, if you have 2147M (Max cash) you can buy 214 tokkul and then have max cash in tokkul, plus make more money.
Sorry, my english sucks.
1 Tokkul = Buy for 10M in shop 1 Tokkul = Sell for 10M in shop
Atm when I buy a tokkul it costs 10m, and when i sell I get 6M...

item.title: Need help with a pretty simple thing
item.dc:creator: @iluvbarbiez iluvbarbiez
item.description:
@iluvbarbiez wrote:

Thank you for your help

Although it still sell for 6m

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a pretty simple thing

change in item.cfg. where it says 6m, change to 10m.
